sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { CloseIcon } from '../../utils/icons'; const PerformanceAnalyticsScreen = ({ artist, onClose }) => { const [selectedMetric, setSelectedMetric] = useState('overview'); // Sample analytics data const analyticsData = { overview: { totalStreams: 2400000, monthlyListeners: 125000, fanGrowth: 15.3, avgRating: 4.8 }, social: { instagram: 89000, spotify: 125000, soundcloud: 67000, website: 15000 }, performance: { avgCrowd: 850, satisfaction: 4.7, bookingRate: 78, repeatBookings: 45 } }; const recentPerformances = [ { id: 1, venue: 'Womb Tokyo', date: '2024-11-30', capacity: 1000, attendance: 950, rating: 4.9, revenue: 3500 }, { id: 2, venue: 'Fabric London', date: '2024-11-15', capacity: 1500, attendance: 1400, rating: 4.7, revenue: 4200 }, { id: 3, venue: 'Berghain', date: '2024-10-28', capacity: 1500, attendance: 1500, rating: 5.0, revenue: 5000 }, { id: 4, venue: 'Output Brooklyn', date: '2024-10-12', capacity: 700, attendance: 680, rating: 4.6, revenue: 3800 } ]; const topTracks = [ { name: 'Underground Dreams', streams: 450000, growth: 12.4 }, { name: 'Tokyo Nights', streams: 320000, growth: 8.7 }, { name: 'Minimal Pulse', streams: 280000, growth: -2.1 }, { name: 'Deep Waters', streams: 210000, growth: 15.8 }, { name: 'Electronic Soul', streams: 185000, growth: 6.3 } ]; const formatNumber = (num) => { if (num >= 1000000) { return (num / 1000000).toFixed(1) + 'M'; } if (num >= 1000) { return (num / 1000).toFixed(1) + 'K'; } return num.toString(); }; return (

{artist?.name} - Analytics

{/* Metric Selector */}
{/* Overview Metrics */} {selectedMetric === 'overview' && (

{formatNumber(analyticsData.overview.totalStreams)}

Total Streams

{formatNumber(analyticsData.overview.monthlyListeners)}

Monthly Listeners

+{analyticsData.overview.fanGrowth}%

Fan Growth

{analyticsData.overview.avgRating}

Avg Rating

Top Tracks

{topTracks.map((track, index) => (
#{index + 1}

{track.name}

{formatNumber(track.streams)} streams

= 0 ? 'positive' : 'negative'}`}> {track.growth >= 0 ? '+' : ''}{track.growth}%
))}
)} {/* Social Metrics */} {selectedMetric === 'social' && (

{formatNumber(analyticsData.social.instagram)}

Instagram Followers

{formatNumber(analyticsData.social.spotify)}

Spotify Followers

{formatNumber(analyticsData.social.soundcloud)}

SoundCloud Followers

{formatNumber(analyticsData.social.website)}

Website Visits

)} {/* Performance Metrics */} {selectedMetric === 'performance' && (

{analyticsData.performance.avgCrowd}

Avg Crowd Size

{analyticsData.performance.satisfaction}

Satisfaction Score

{analyticsData.performance.bookingRate}%

Booking Success

{analyticsData.performance.repeatBookings}%

Repeat Bookings

Recent Performances

{recentPerformances.map(show => (

{show.venue}

{new Date(show.date).toLocaleDateString()}

{show.attendance}/{show.capacity} Attendance
{show.rating}â˜… Rating
))}
)} {/* Analytics Actions */}
); }; export default PerformanceAnalyticsScreen;
